titleStmt.title: The lovers quarrel, or, Cupids triumph being the pleasant history of Fair Rosamond of Scotland, being daughter to the Lord Aundel whose love was obtained by the valour of Tommy Pots who conquered the Lord Phenix and wounded him and after obtained her to be his wife.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
